description.value:
Trigger An undead or a creature with negative healing enters the garden

Effect The birds screech in panic, dealing [[/r (3d12+20)[sonic]]] damage to all creatures in the garden (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:44|basic:true]). On a failure, the creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Stunned]{Stunned 3} on a critical failure). The trap then rolls initiative.

details.description: Hundreds of panicked whippoorwills swarm through the area.
details.disable: @Check[type:nature|dc:43] (master) to calm the birds, @Check[type:occultism|dc:45] (master) to alter your aura, or @Check[type:performance|dc:45] (master) to imitate the living
details.reset: The trap deactivates and resets if 1 minute passes without any undead or creatures with negative healing in the garden.
details.routine: (1 action) The birds swarm wildly through the garden, pecking and slashing at all undead creatures and creatures with negative healing in the garden, dealing [[/r (3d10+20)[slashing]]] damage and [[/r 1d10[bleed]]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:44|basic:true]).
